definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
in those days/then/in those years/during that time
in those days/then/in those years/during that time

sentences.english: He felt browned off when he heard that he waw dismissed.
sentences.chinese: 当他听到自己被解职时感到很不痛快。

sentences.english: When I go dhave the long steep Road of Darkness.
sentences.chinese: 当我行走在黑暗而险峻的路上。

sentences.english: When you’re a kid, you cannot go anywhere by yourself.
sentences.chinese: 当你是一个孩子的时候，你不能自己去任何地方。

sentences.english: And when Owl hooted , Bluebird could not sleep.
sentences.chinese: 当猫头鹰叫的时候，知更鸟睡不着。

sentences.english: Mr Thant, however, skirts three difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 然而，有三个问题吴丹敏处理不得当。

sentences.english: Beauty is truth's smile when she look ins her own fgenius in a particular excellent mirror.
sentences.chinese: 美即是道理的含笑，当她在完整的镜子前揽镜自照。

sentences.english: When you are in love, what in your eyes are all happy singles.
sentences.chinese: 当你恋爱的时候，你看到的都是快乐的单身族。

sentences.english: When I please my boss, I am ass-kissing.
sentences.chinese: 当我讨上司欢心的时候，我是拍马屁。

sentences.english: Rita repeated what Reardon recited when Reardon road the remarks.
sentences.chinese: 当利尔登阅读评论时，丽塔复述尔登背诵的东西。

sentences.english: When she came back, she did her summer exercise first.
sentences.chinese: 当她回到家中之后，她首先做了暑假作业。

sentences.english: While Charles was in prison, Sydney Carton had also arrived in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 当查尔斯在坐牢时，悉尼卡尔登也来到了巴黎。

sentences.english: When you have the measles, you break out in spots.
sentences.chinese: 当你得麻疹时会出疹子。

sentences.english: I have the answer when I am in Eurasia.
sentences.chinese: 当我身临欧亚时，我已经知道了。

sentences.english: Play checkers while the plants grow.
sentences.chinese: 当等待植物生长时，可以下下棋。

sentences.english: Then when you get older and think back, you’ll be able to enjoy it a second time.
sentences.chinese: 当你年老回首往事时，便能再次享受你的一生。

sentences.english: When I was doing the housework, my husband telephoned me from the office.
sentences.chinese: 当我正在干家务时，我丈夫从办公室打电话给我。

definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
